advanced-configurations/cypress-test-rep.title: ‚Ü≥ Cypress
advanced-configurations/cypress-test-rep.description: Cypress is a popular open-source test automation framework that allows teams to write, run, and debug tests for web applications. With its intuitive API and easy-to-use interface, Cypress makes it simple for teams to create reliable and maintainable test suites for their web applications.
